content: लाक्षणिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [लक्षणया बोधयति ठक्] {@--1@} One who is acquainted with marks or signs. {@--2@} Characteristic, indicatory. {@--3@} Having a secondary sense, used in a secondary sense (as a word, as distinguished from वाच्य and व्यंजक <ab>q. v.</ab>); स्याद्वाचंको लाक्षणिकः शब्दोऽत्र व्यंजकस्त्रिधा <ls>K. P. 2.</ls> {@--4@} Expressing indirectly or figuratively. {@--5@} Secondary, inferior. {@--6@} Technical. --कः A technical term.
